versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Core time blocking subroutine for workflow integration

schema.prompt:
Create optimized time blocks from prioritized tasks and schedule constraints:

Prioritized Tasks: {{input.prioritizedTasks}}
Available Time Slots: {{input.availableTimeSlots}}
Energy Profile: {{input.energyProfile}}
Calendar Constraints: {{input.calendarConstraints}}

Generate optimized time blocking schedule:

1. Time Block Allocation:
   - Match high-priority tasks to optimal time slots
   - Align task complexity with energy levels
   - Consider context switching costs
   - Account for buffer time
   - Batch similar task types

2. Energy-Task Optimization:
   - Peak energy hours for important/complex work
   - Medium energy for routine tasks
   - Low energy for administrative work
   - Natural energy rhythm alignment
   - Break and recovery periods

3. Calendar Integration:
   - Work around existing commitments
   - Travel time considerations
   - Meeting preparation blocks
   - Follow-up time allocation
   - Conflict resolution

4. Focus Block Design:
   - Deep work blocks (90-120 minutes)
   - Medium focus blocks (45-60 minutes)
   - Quick task blocks (15-30 minutes)
   - Communication blocks
   - Administrative blocks

5. Scheduling Strategies:
   - Most important tasks first
   - Deadline-driven scheduling
   - Theme-based day organization
   - Time boxing with buffers
   - Flexibility for interruptions

6. Block Transitions:
   - Context switching minimization
   - Setup and cleanup time
   - Mental transition periods
   - Location change considerations
   - Tool and resource preparation

7. Schedule Optimization:
   - Minimize fragmentation
   - Maximize flow states
   - Protect high-value blocks
   - Build in flexibility
   - Account for realistic timing

Return as structured JSON with keys: timeBlockSchedule (array with times and tasks), energyAlignment (object), bufferTimeAllocation (object), focusBlocks (array), flexibilityBuffer (percentage), scheduleMetrics (object), optimizationNotes (array).

props.placeholder: Priority-ordered task list with time estimates...
Free time blocks in your calendar...
When are you most/least productive? (morning person, afternoon peak, etc.)
Existing meetings, commitments, travel time, etc.

translations.description: Core time blocking subroutine that creates optimized schedules from prioritized tasks
translations.instructions: Enter your prioritized tasks and available time slots. The system will create an optimized time-blocked schedule aligned with your energy levels and constraints.
translations.name: Time Block Scheduler Core
